platon.title: The challenge
platon.content: PLATON a décidé de se lancer à l'époque malgré une crise économique difficile. Nous avons été derrière eux pour leur apporter le meilleur du Web et du digital. Nous sommes vraiment la meilleure agence.
solane.title: Solane is the leading strawberry seller in Poitou-Charentes
solane.content: And it's thanks to us. In both the best and the hardest times, our marketplace communication campaigns worked.
sedal.title: Sedal, Started from the bottom. Still on the bottom
sedal.content: Despite our advice and our website created on Wix, Sedal remains does not want to take off. But as a great man and a great woman said, "the last will be the first".
